description: Mean Chlorophyll a Concentration, mg m^-3 shows he seasonal climatology /mean productivity over a  fourteen year season /period. Longterm montly mean data (fro 203-2016 was retrieved from Environmental Research Division's Data Access Program website (ERDDAP) and binned by season to calculate Seasonal Mean/climatology.
name: Sept,Oct, Nov 2003-2016  Mean Chlorophyll a Concentration, mg m^-3
